data.message:
Dude Shave the Justin off your face ... lol ... Hills have eyes boy ... I can see you ... lol THE LETTER© 
Hi baby,
I Just wanted to talk ... 
It was nice knowing you ... But it's time I start to walk .
I'm sorry I'm not your girl anymore ... 
The one you used to love ... 
I used to not put anyone above ya ... 
But push came to shove
Your lies and games ... don't work on me anymore ;;;
I'm not entertained nor anymore surprised ... 
All I see is emptiness when I look upon your eyes
You always second guessed me ... 
You put me second ... so I started to guess you .. 
I found out who you truly are ... 
Pain suffering and misery 
It's what you love to put people through. 
People always owe you ! 
You only give when you think you will get more in return .. 
Let the next victim feel the burn. 
I know you can play and put on all the charm ... 
It's when they discover, that you become unarmed .....
The mask falls off your face to expose who you truly are. 
Sorry Baby .... I don't love you anymore .... 
It's hard to love a person ... who loves them self more.
I know you won't read this letter ... 
You never listened to my words ... 
So I'm writing a sad love song to make me feel better. 
One day you'll hear it .... on the radio sitting in your car... 
familiar .... distant and far 
Briefly think about me as you gaze out into the stars .. 
As you hear the tears of the singers voice echo my words .... 
You'll smile inside yourself .... thinking .. that bitch is absurd.
Cause Baby your not sorry ... you never were ... 
you were never wrong ... 
Your ego fed away your guilt by finding it's own cure. 
Tried to destroy me for being strong, independent and secure. 
You thought you could me me weak and fall insecure .. 
Baby you were wrong ... 
I'm not that unsure.
You took my kindness for weakness .. 
My forgiveness as me on my knees .
I'm over .. over trying ... never to achieve
Trying to love a man who is full of lust and greed. 
I see you talking to new girls all innocent and sweet ... 
If they only knew you ... and what you've done to me .. 
Play your game of thrones ... and Game of hearts ... 
Because in the end ... 
You'll be the one holding a bad hand of cards©
MC/SayDee © aka The Devil's Angel
